channel.title: Data access on harre.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Data access on harre.dev

item.title: Fluent data access
item.description: Working in a team of developers, the following might happen: Developer 1 creates a piece of UI and adds a method to load data into said UI. The method he creates is called GetUserInfo(…) Here comes Developer 2 and he also creates a piece of UI that displays user info. Developer 2 however, needs to display more than just the user info, he also needs the requests made by the user.
